name: Registrar's Office
description: Main office for Student registration. Located in Room C-150, Phone: 1-800-565-4723

name: International Education Center
description: Center for assisting all international Students.Located in Room C-429, Ext:7031

name: Experienced Worker Centre
description: The EWC helps adults who have been laid-off,or are simply considering a new career.Located in Room A-214, Ext:7127, walk-in between the hours of 9:00 am and 4:30 pm Monday to Friday.

name: Student Success Specialists
description: Student Success Specialists provide support and resources to help students achieve their academic and personal goal. Each school has a different specialist, the links on this page guide you to each specialist.

name: Welcome Centre
description: The Welcome Centre is located in the Student Commons, E building, on the 3rd floor. To speak with a member of the Welcome Centre team, call 613-727-4723 ext. 7200.

name: Health Services
description: The College’s Health Services provides professional, confidential medical services. Physicians are often available without an appointment. Call 613-727-4723 ext. 7222.

name: ITS
description: ITS has three Service Desk locations to serve you. Each serves one of the college campuses and its satelites: Woodroffe, Pembroke, and Perth. Call 613-727-4723 ext. 5555.
